main event: On 3 Oct 55, three objects were observed in the sky over Oxford, PA, during a 20-minute sighting.
interesting points: The objects displayed straight flight with no sound,The sighting initially involved two objects, with a third appearing later,The objects were described as moving at approximately 6,000 miles per hour,One observer reported a luminous red dome on top of the circular object,The investigation suggested the objects could possibly be balloons or aircraft.
witness description: garage owner and school bus driver, age 48
